DOC.brief_summary: Bilateral cleave lip palate neonate randomly assign one two group : ( gp1 presurgical Naso-alveolar molding ( NAM ) use Grayson method , gp 2 computer aid design NAM ( CAD/NAM ) . The aim study compare short term clinical effect intervention regard alveolar alignment , nasal esthetic interlabial gap .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Clinical Effectiveness Naso-alveolar Molding ( NAM ) Versus Computer Aided Design NAM ( CAD/NAM ) Infants With Bilateral Cleft Lip Palate : A Randomized Clinical Trial
